# NETWORK::NETWORK_SHOW_CHAT_RESTRICTION_MSC

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** localGamer

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Call to show system message about chat restriction.

Does nothing (it's a nullsub).
